member.name: ICredentialProviderUserArray.GetAccountOptions
member.summary: Retrieves a value that indicates whether the "Other user" tile for local or Microsoft accounts is shown in the logon or credential UI. This information can be used by a credential provider to show the same behavior as the password or Microsoft account provider.
member.param: A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives one or more flags that specify which empty tiles are shown by the logon or credential UI.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICredentialProviderUserArray.GetAt
member.summary: Retrieves a specified user from the array.
member.param: The 0-based array index of the user. The size of the array can be obtained through the method.

The address of a pointer to an object that, when this method returns successfully, represents the specified user. It is the responsibility of the caller to free this object when it is no longer needed by calling its method.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code, including the following:

listheader.description: The index specified in userIndex is out of range.

member.name: ICredentialProviderUserArray.GetCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of objects in the user array.
member.param: A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives the number of users in the array.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICredentialProviderUserArray.SetProviderFilter
member.summary: Limits the set of users in the array to either local accounts or Microsoft accounts.
member.param: Set this parameter to Identity_LocalUserProvider for the local accounts credential provider; otherwise set it to the GUID of the Microsoft account provider.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICredentialProviderUserArray
member.summary: Represents the set of users that will appear in the logon or credential UI. This information enables the credential provider to enumerate the set to retrieve property information about each user to populate fields or filter the set.
